strings.evolution:
When I was younger, I had a dream
that I desperately tried to fulfill...
I wish to pursue it once more.
strings.affinity:
I think I like you now.
One day I might even give you a
ride on the world's fastest ship!
strings.description: A gambler from another world where magic and espers once lived. Setzer built a casino on his beloved ship, the Blackjack, as a symbol of his carefree lifestyle. After meeting Celes and being impressed by the way in which she tried to deceive him, he decided to help her and her friends in their efforts against the empire. His airship may have granted the group great mobility, but Kefka's eventual destruction of the world would also result in the unfortunate loss of the Blackjack.
strings.fusion:
Everything's a gamble.
You either trick, or get tricked.
It's all just one big game.
strings.summon:
I will help you.
With my life as a chip,
I'll be on you all!

strings.affinity:
I think I like you now.
One day I might even give you a
ride on the world's fastest ship!
strings.description: A gambler from another world where magic and espers once lived. As owner of the airship known as the Blackjack, Setzer has spent most of his time gambling his life away, quite literally. He had planned to kidnap the famous opera star Maria to make her his bride, but his plans were foiled when she was replaced with Celes as part of her group's efforts against the empire. Although he sees through the farce, and the coin trick she performs for him, he still decides to keep his promise to help her.
strings.fusion:
Life is but a constant gamble against fate.
That's my take, at least.
strings.summon:
Betting my life on something...
It's been awhile since I felt this tingle.

strings.evolution:
Without wings, one cannot expect to
become the fastest man in the world.
I shall once again pursue my dream.
strings.affinity:
I think I like you now.
One day I might even give you a
ride on the world's fastest ship!
strings.description: A gambler from another world where magic and espers once lived. The destruction of the world also resulted in the destruction of Setzer's beloved airship, the Blackjack. Phased by these events, he turns to alcohol to avoid the harsh reality until he is reunited with Celes, who manages to convince him to rejoin their cause. Together they visit the tomb of Setzer's close friend Darill, where they dig out the remains of her old airship, the Falcon, in hopes of using it as transport. Soaring the skies with Celes and her friends once again, they travel around the world looking for the rest of their scattered comrades.
strings.fusion:
Those who carry around something
that they truly cherish cannot
afford to gamble with it.
strings.summon:
We should do the opposite of what we're
thinking. Then again, that could
be a mistake, as well.
